title: Intelsat and OneWeb to provide multi-orbit inflight connectivity
summary: Intelsat said Aug. 11 it has signed a global distribution deal with OneWeb to provide multi-orbit inflight connectivity solutions for airlines.

title: SpaceX to continue Starlink expansion with third launch to shell 3
summary: SpaceX is set to launch the Starlink Group 3-3 mission on Friday, marking the company’s 55th dedicated launch to build its satellite internet constellation. Group 3-3 will take flight on a flight-proven Falcon 9 rocket from Space Launch Complex 4E at Vandenberg Space Force Base in California, with a one-second launch window at 2:40 pm PDT (21:40 UTC).

title: Rocket Report: SpaceX sees rideshare demand, Russia’s odd launch deal with Iran

title: SpaceX set to launch third batch of sun-synchronous Starlink satellites
summary: SpaceX says it’s on track to launch a third batch of operational Starlink satellites to sun-synchronous orbit (SSO) as early as 2:40...

title: Army looking at new ways to use space technology for unconventional warfare
summary: Army officials at the Space and Missile Defense Symposium said space and cyber technologies should be used in support of special operations and information warfare
